content: I tried to register for ballot at HL7 website, but I can't get access to member area. The site keeps redirecting to login page, even though I'm already logged in. Are there any special requirements?
Ewout explained. Apparently I'm not a voting member.
should be able to get a coherent error message
Thanks for mentioning me. I'll take a look with the account and follow up. Thanks again!
Michel, can you tell me the browser you were using to access the site?
Tried both Firefox and MS Edge. Log in, navigate to ballot => "You are trying to access members-only content."
